articles.author: Alex Hammer
articles.title: Walt Disney World denounces high school drill team performance that used Native American stereotypes - Daily Mail
articles.description: Disney World says it 'regrets' performance by visiting 'Indianettes' drill team that featured American Indian stereotypes including chants of 'scalp them.'
articles.content: Disney World officials say they 'regret' allowing a Texas high school drill team to parade in their park Tuesday with a performance that featured American Indian stereotypes including repeated chants… [+7830 chars]

articles.author: George Simpson
articles.title: Brian May announces streaming of Queen and Paul Rodgers Ukraine concert for relief today - Express
articles.description: BRIAN MAY and Roger Taylor have announced a YouTube special screening of Queen and Paul Rodgers' 2008 Kharkiv concert to raise funds for Ukraine Relief.
